items.sentence: Tom fed his dog the same thing he was eating.
Tom dropped his children off three hours ago.
Tom doesn't like it when people laugh at him.
Tom didn't know what Mary was planning to do.
Tom didn't even try to convince Mary to stay.
Tom couldn't remember where he hid the money.
Tom came to Boston hoping to find a job here.
Tom called me and asked me to come to Boston.
Tom bought his daughter the dress she wanted.
Tom bought a used bicycle for thirty dollars.
